problem.markdown: >>What does this indicate .DC Vds 0 5 0.5 Vgs 0 5 1?<< (x) the voltage Vds will be swept from 0 to 5V in steps of 1V for every value of Vgs. ( ) he voltage Vgs will be swept from 0 to 5V in steps of 1V for every value of Vds. () ( ) he voltage Vds will be swept from 0 to 1V in steps of 5V for every value of Vgs. ( ) none of them
problem.p: What does this indicate .DC Vds 0 5 0.5 Vgs 0 5 1?
